messages.subject: Re: Live and Learn conference
messages.msgSnippet: Ren, I can t wait to hear all about it! I m hoping to be able to talk my husband into going to the 2007 conference. I know the kids would love it! I ve been
messages.messageBody:
Ren, I can't wait to hear all about it! I'm hoping to be able to talk
my husband into going to the 2007 conference. I know the kids would
love it! I've been reading people's experiences at this year's
conference & it sounds awesome!

~Tracy

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Live and Learn conference
messages.msgSnippet: ... conference last night. I m back too! Live and Learn was amazing. I ve got a couple of photos up on my blog with more to come. I ve also got some pics and
messages.messageBody:
>>I just returned from the 5th annual Live and Learn unschooling
conference last night.>>

I'm back too! Live and Learn was amazing. I've got a couple of photos up on my blog with more to come. I've also got some pics and musings from my trip to DC, London and Paris. It's been great to get to travel so much, but it's good to be home for awhile! I look forward to getting back into the conversations here.

--
~Mary
http://zenmommasgarden.blogspot.com/

"The miracle is not to walk on water. The miracle is to walk on the
green earth, dwelling deeply in the present moment and feeling truly
alive."
~Thich Nhat Hanh

-------------- Original message ----------------------
From: "Ren Allen" <starsuncloud@...>
> I just returned from the 5th annual Live and Learn unschooling
> conference last night. Suffice it to say, it was a magical and

>
> It was so great to see familiar faces and meet some new ones. So much
> incredible energy was shared all week and new connections made. I
> can't put into words how it feels to be surrounded by your "tribe".
> I'm so grateful for this event that has created a diverse and rich
> community.
>
> If anyone here missed this year and wants to attend, it's not too
> early to start planning for next year!! Asheville NC is next year's
> location and it's going to be an awesome event.
>
> I'm going to spend some time processing last week and all the great
> things that happened....I'll post to my blog as soon as I get it all
> distilled (and some photos developed). It's good to be back online.:)
>
> Ren
> learninginfreedom.com

messages.subject: Live and Learn conference
messages.msgSnippet: I just returned from the 5th annual Live and Learn unschooling conference last night. Suffice it to say, it was a magical and empowering week...once again. The
messages.messageBody:
I just returned from the 5th annual Live and Learn unschooling
conference last night. Suffice it to say, it was a magical and
empowering week...once again. The hotel in Albuquerque was magnificent!

It was so great to see familiar faces and meet some new ones. So much
incredible energy was shared all week and new connections made. I
can't put into words how it feels to be surrounded by your "tribe".
I'm so grateful for this event that has created a diverse and rich
community.

If anyone here missed this year and wants to attend, it's not too
early to start planning for next year!! Asheville NC is next year's
location and it's going to be an awesome event.

I'm going to spend some time processing last week and all the great
things that happened....I'll post to my blog as soon as I get it all
distilled (and some photos developed). It's good to be back online.:)

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
